import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Button, Card, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { BookshelfContext } from './utils/BookshelfContext' export const Result = (props) => { const { title, id, pages, authors, summary, categories } = props.data[0] const { addToLibrary } = useContext(BookshelfContext) return ( {/* */} {title} {authors[0]} | {categories ? categories : "No genre available."} {summary ? summary : "No summary available for this work."}
) }
